name: Introductory Linguistics
description: Introduction to the fundamentals of linguistics, including phonetics, phonology, morphology, syntax, semantics, and pragmatics.

name: Introduction to Syntax
description: An introduction to the basics of syntax, including the core components of sentence structure.

name: Intermediate Syntax
description: A more in-depth exploration of syntax, including the analysis of sentences, phrase structure, and the organization of words.

name: Semantics
description: An introduction to semantics, including the study of meaning in language.

name: Advanced Syntax and Semantics
description: A more advanced exploration of syntax and semantics, including the study of complex sentence structure and the application of meaning to sentences.
